title: CAN'T CONNECT TO THE GAME !!!!!!!??"?!:!?!??
body:
OMG this is second time i can't play ! i am waiting for the game to start and this happens ! 
https://ctrlv.cz/JAqQ
when i click it.. nothing happens ! i got a fukin' leaver buster for that.. i don't want to get banned !!!!!!!!!!!!!! for no reason ! i reported this as a bug earlier when i wanted to play ranked games... please fix how can i fix it ? ??

replies.body: It doesn't look like there's a bug going on here, but that your network is having problems getting connected to our servers. When this happens, it's best to take a step back to try and fix these issues before you try joining more games and end up with a leaverbuster. Hit up our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some basic troubleshooting steps, and make sure to test it in **custom games** to avoid any penalties.
